819576819603140609.text: A quick #TBT to the article from the @idsnews about the first piece of legislation I introduced: #TermLimits! https://t.co/9PpSSb7ylH

819238326452490240.text: Obamacare has failed the American people: options have reduced and premiums have skyrocketed. Now is the time for #FullRepeal.

818594454210748416.text: Today, I introduced my first piece of legislation: a Constitutional Amendment in favor of #TermLimits for Members of Congress.
